function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of experience about resilience engineering","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to disruptive events and inability to effectively absorb shocks","Mitigation":"Provide specialized training and education on resilience engineering","Technologies":"Training and educational programs on resilience engineering","People":"Workers, engineers, and management","Owner":"Management and organizational leaders"},{"Description":"Choosing production over safety","Impact":"Higher risk of disruptive events and reduced focus on resilience and safety measures","Mitigation":"Implement safety protocols, prioritize safety in decision-making","Technologies":"Safety management systems and decision support tools","People":"Workers, management, and safety professionals","Owner":"Management and safety professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of reporting system","Impact":"Inability to identify and address potential disruptions and safety hazards","Mitigation":"Implement a robust reporting system for identifying and addressing safety concerns","Technologies":"Safety reporting and incident management software","People":"Workers and management","Owner":"Management and safety professionals"}]}
